details:
adjective
- strikingly beautiful or attractive
= example: strikingly beautiful or attractive
- commanding attention
= example: commanding attention
= synonyms: arresting, sensational
- causing or capable of causing bewilderment or shock or insensibility
= example: causing or capable of causing bewilderment or shock or insensibility
- causing great astonishment and consternation
= example: causing great astonishment and consternation
